ARDSMAICR 0.1.1
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Datasets

    data_study
    Study metadata - ARDS MAIC Update 1.0.0
    data_genes
    Overall ARDS MAIC results - ARDS MAIC Update 1.0.0
    data_contributions
    Overall gene list contributions - ARDS MAIC Update 1.0.0
    data_biolitmine
    BioLitMine results - ARDS MAIC Update 1.0.0
    data_covidmaic
    SARS-CoV-2 MAIC genes - ARDS MAIC Update 1.0.0

    Summary tables

    design_table()
    Create a table of study designs
    methods_table()
    Create a table of study methods
    gene_table()
    Table of genes

    Helper functions - counts

    count_genes()
    Count total number of genes
    count_lists()
    Count total number of gene lists

    Helper functions - genes

    genes_per_list()
    Count number of genes by gene list
    genes_per_method()
    Count number of genes by method
    genes_per_category()
    Count number of genes by category

    Helper functions - lists

    lists_per_gene()
    Count number of gene lists supporting each gene
    lists_per_method()
    Count number of gene lists by method
    lists_per_method_per_gene()
    Count number of gene lists by method by gene
    lists_per_category()
    Count number of gene lists by category
    lists_per_category_per_gene()
    Count number of gene lists by category by gene

    Helper functions - methods and categories

    methods_per_gene()
    Count number of methods supporting each gene
    categories_per_gene()
    Count number of categories supporting each gene
    methods_upset()
    Methods upset plot
    categories_upset()
    Categories upset plot

    Gene prioritisation

    inflection_point()
    Calculate the inflection point
    inflection_point_plot()
    Plot the inflection point

    Information content and contribution

    contributions_calculation()
    Calculate study contributions
    inf_adj_matrix()
    Information adjacency matrix
    normalise_gene_scores()
    Normalise gene scores
